types.section:
{{fr-adj|sp=second}}

# not [[happy]] with …, not [[satisfied]] with …, not [[content]] with …

====Usage notes====
* Followed by a noun or an infinitive.
* Agrees in gender and number with the subject.
* Synonymous with ''non seulement … mais en plus'': [[not only … but also]].
types.html:
non content de (feminine non contente de, masculine plural non contents de, feminine plural non contentes de)

  1. not happy with …, not satisfied with …, not content with …

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Followed by a noun or an infinitive.
  • Agrees in gender and number with the subject.
  • Synonymous with non seulement … mais en plus: not only … but also.
trans: not happy with …, not satisfied with …, not content with …
not happy with …, not satisfied with …, not content with …

title: non content de
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /nɔ̃ kɔ̃.tɑ̃ də/
